title: Prettywear Women's Floral Chiffon Long Sleeve Mini Dress Flowy A-Line Wrap Neck Tie Back Short Dress
description: Chiffon Material / Lined: the floral printed mini dress is made of soft and Lightweight delicate chiffon, with lining, not see-through, flowy, and very comfortable to wear in all seasons

Wrap V-neck / Tie Back: The dress features a sexy wrap front and back V-neckline with ties in the back, The V-neck is adjustable by the back tie, so you can control the amount of cleavage you want to show and how much "open back" you want

Fashion Design: Printed, A-line, smocked waist, long sleeve, mini length, The body of the dress is opaquely lined with soft material, while the long slightly see-through sleeves, smocked cuffs, and ruffle hem also add a more romantic and sweet sense

Occasions: Daily Wear, birthdays, Shopping, Dating, Weekend gatherings, Beach, Parties, Vacation, Honeymoon, Homecoming, Wedding guests. etc. This boho floral ruffle dress is great to pair with boots, high heels, and sandals, wedges
